Over 6,000 public schools nationally are under two miles of a

Superfund site

Each dot shows how far a public school is from a Superfund site within a 1.8 radius.

Majority of these schools are

located in California and New Jersey.

Nearly 600 of these schools

are located in low-income

counties.
